articles.author: Ewan Murray
articles.title: Fresh look to US PGA Championship leaderboard with Will Zalatoris on top at halfway stage - The Guardian
articles.description: American Will Zalatoris held a one-shot lead over Mito Pereira of Chile at the halfway point of the US PGA Championship
articles.content:
US PGA
  • American holds one-shot lead over Mito Pereira at Southern Hills
  • Rory McIlroy hits 71 but still in picture five shots off leader
In the city that houses a new museum … [+4600 chars]
